records.name: Summer Island Maldives Resort

descriptions.general: General description: The hotel Summer Island Maldives Resort is located in the vicinity of its own sandy beach. At the beach are sun umbrellas free of charge available. The town Male is around 35 km away. The airport (MLE) is approx. 26 km away. The hotel and airport are linked by a shuttle (for a fee). There is also a shuttle to the resort via Seaplane (for a fee). Amenities: The 2-storey resort has 156 rooms in total. It offers its guests a reception (check-in from 14:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby, air conditioning, a safe (where applicable, for a fee), a shop and a money changing facility. For the meals, there are two restaurants. WiFi is available for free. Concierge service is free of charge. Room service, laundry / ironing service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one pool. Here, there are sun umbrellas for a fee available. A bar at the pool offers guests refreshing beverages. Meals: Breakfast from the buffet. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Billiards (where applicable, for a fee), badminton (where applicable, for a fee), darts (where applicable, for a fee), table tennis (where applicable, for a fee) and fitness. Spa area, sauna and massages available (where applicable for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English. Accepted methods of payment: Visa. Superior Bungalow (Speedboat Included): With balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Superior Bungalow (Seaplane Included): With balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Superior Beach Room (Speedboat Included): With balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Superior Beach Room (Seaplane Included): With balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Superior Vista Room (Speedboat Included): With balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. records.short_description: Comfortable resort with outdoor pool, shuttle service and poolside bar
